Contaminated_Strike.help: The Contaminated Strike is a moderate melee attack that releases radioactive energy on impact, which can Knock Down foes, and reduce a target's Defense.
Contaminated_Strike.targetHelp: The Contaminated Strike has weakened your Defenses!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Neutrino_Bolt.help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

X-Ray_Beam.help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Electron_Haze.help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.targetHelp: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Revolver.help: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.
Revolver.targetHelp: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.

Shotgun.help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.
Shotgun.targetHelp: Good at close range. Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.
